proper noun.description: A city in northeastern Kansas, southwest of Kansas City; population 60,954 (est. 2008).
An industrial city in central Oklahoma; population 30,562 (est. 2008).

noun.description: A member of a North American people living formerly in the eastern US and now chiefly in Oklahoma.
The Algonquian language of the Shawnee.

adjective.description: Relating to the Shawnee or their language.
